GSD.description:
drm/amd/display: fix overflow on MIN_I64 definition

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit a47d92c74b1e884336abd7fcd6a0daefafcf6ea5. For more details please see the references link.
